programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug turns the basement into a recreation room when his big-screen TV is delivered - until Carrie's father and sister move in. Pilot episode of the comedy, starring Kevin James and Leah Remini.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: After stumbling on a photo of Carrie's overweight mother, Doug pretends to go on a diet to persuade his wife to lose a few pounds. Kevin James stars.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra invites her divorced parents to Thanksgiving dinner, and Raymond sees something shocking that convinces him they are getting back together. The truth, however, proves far stranger. Robert Culp and Katherine Helmond guest star.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is annoyed to discover Marie is plying his brother with gifts of scented candles and massage oils. However, his mood changes when he deduces her real motive - to put Robert in a romantic mood, in the hope he will provide her with grandchildren.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Crane brothers are delighted when their social standing grows thanks to a Russian caviar dealer, who offers them good quality roe at knock-down prices. Daphne tries to persuade a reluctant Martin to return $40 dispensed in error by a cash machine.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink turns interior designer to help a local home-building scheme, but his plans prove too grand for the new residents, and he is soon shown the door. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A street singer annoys Frasier and Niles, prompting them to set out in search of a new coffee house to frequent, and Daphne has her physical therapy techniques evaluated by an independent professional. Elvis Costello guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by guests Caroline Flack, Verity Rushworth and Ed Byrne. With music from Cold War Kids.(n)

programme.title: Eat the Week
programme.desc: Simon Rimmer shows a family how to make smoked haddock koulibiak, smokey chilli and chocolate trifle, while Michela Chiappa reports on rhubarb, chorizo and chillis.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Selma realises her hopes of ever bearing a child are diminishing and flies to China to adopt a baby. Asked to fill in her husband's name on the application, she pretends to be married to Homer - but the company co-ordinator (guest star Lucy Liu) sees through the deception. Also featuring the voices of Robert Wagner and David Silverman.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer moves into a camper van parked in the backyard, while Marge retains sole residence of the family home, prompting Bart to take swift action in a bid to reunite them. Unfortunately, his plan entails a perilous drive along the freeway - which culminates in a disaster on board a Turkish container ship.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The architect meets a father and son building an ambitious clifftop retreat and a young architect embarking on his first commission - a garden pavilion for his gran. Master craftsman Will Hardie sets out to transform the humble beach hut into the most unlikely of holiday getaways, and in Germany, George visits a modern house in a medieval town.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: A few years ago Kieran Alexander was involved in a serious motorbike accident that has given her, and partner Dave Dwyer, a new outlook on life - that it is for living and there is no time like the present. They've decided to leave their stressful lives in the UK behind and start again in the Azores in the Atlantic. With a budget of £100,000 to fund their new home, Ben Hillman shows them five properties on the main island of Sao Miguel.(n)

programme.title: Homes by the Sea
programme.desc: Charlie Luxton visits properties in Suffolk, including a house in the clouds, a contemporary coastal cottage in Southwold, and a seafront town house in Aldeburgh.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Steve Jones and David Coulthard present action from the ninth round of the season, which took place at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg. All eyes will have been on Sebastian Vettel and Lewis Hamilton at this meeting following their racing incident at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix last time out, which only served to heat up their rivalry as they continue to battle for the drivers' championship.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of China's Forbidden City
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the Beijing palace that housed Chinese emperors for 600 years. The programme reveals the current conservation work being carried out and uncovers new details about past rulers, including trade with Europe and how a marble staircase was transported along an ice road. A scale model is used to demonstrate how the structure was built to withstand earthquakes.(n)

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: Offred remembers her family's escape attempt, leading to a shocking revelation about her life before the Gilead regime that gives her a new perspective on her current situation.(n)

programme.title: Epidemic: When Britain Fought Aids
programme.desc: Documentary examining the impact of the disease on British society, and how it has influenced the country in subsequent years. Paul O'Grady and Jean Paul Gaultier are among those sharing their personal stories, as well as activists and frontline doctors.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts, with Sean Lock and Stephen Mangan taking on guest captain Richard Ayoade and Katherine Ryan, and Bill Bailey in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Two secret agents find their lifelong friendship threatened when they fall in love with the same woman. The smitten spies cannot resist using their espionage skills and an array of gadgets to spy on her and sabotage each other's chances of romance, distracting them from a terrorist planning revenge on them. Comedy, with Reese Witherspoon, Chris Pine and Tom Hardy.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef tries to change the fortunes of the Old Stone Mill restaurant in Tuckahoe, New York, which is struggling to attract customers, leading to debts of nearly $1million. Gordon feels the owner is more interested in his own appearance than how his food tastes and a screaming match ensues.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by comedians Roisin Conaty and Kumail Nanjiani for a light-hearted review of the significant moments of the past seven days. The quintet offer their own unique insight into some of the most difficult and delicate issues in modern Britain, and answer that most important of questions: is it OK?.(n)

programme.title: KOTV Boxing Weekly
programme.desc: Sam Eggington v Ceferino Rodriguez. Highlights of the European Welterweight title fight at Barclaycard Arena in Birmingham, plus action from a memorable Amir Khan fight in 2012.(n)

programme.title: Gillette World Sport
programme.desc: Featuring profiles of UFC star Gunnar Nelson and BMX rider Australian Kyle Baldock, action from the Rally Poland, and highlights of the Cliff Diving World Series event in Ireland.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: Stu and Jemma win a contract to transport a 20ft sailing boat worth £4,000 from Cornwall to North Yorkshire, Laurie sets off on the final leg of her Gruffalo run, while Raymond and Grant take extra precautions to protect the canoe - and pick up some kilt material in Edinburgh on the way.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help house-hunters in Oxfordshire, beginning with military couple Chris and Nikki, who have their hearts set on a rural home with plenty of potential to renovate. The property experts also come to the aid of Richard and Jane, who wish to move their large family into more suitable accommodation. Despite a budget of £500,000, the task seems impossible to achieve because of their extensive list of requirements.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with former tennis player Greg Rusedski in Dictionary Corner alongside wordsmith Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Karen moves in with a new room-mate, and Will starts to rely on painkillers while nursing an injury. Madonna guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Karen is shocked to discover that Will is Stan's lawyer when her divorce proceedings get under way, while Grace's most important client has a fling with Jack. Guest starring Macaulay Culkin.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Amy's brother Peter turns to Ray for advice on talking to women, while Debra decides to help out by throwing a party and inviting all her single friends.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra nags Raymond to tidy up after himself, but he is more concerned with a letter he has received from his sporting hero - which accidentally ends up in the bin.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin is given the night shift as punishment for refusing to take his boss's sister out on a date, and Frasier becomes jealous of his former agent Bebe's close relationship with a celebrity lifestyle guru. Guest starring Dr Phil McGraw.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin worries he may not be Niles and Frasier's father after noticing their similarities to his wife's former research partner. Meanwhile, Daphne enrols her yet-to-be-conceived child at an exclusive school. Comedy, guest starring David Ogden Stiers.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz goes for a job interview at a rival station, and Frasier shares an impromptu kiss with Julia while trying to steal files from her ex's office. Niles visits a shooting range and ends up enjoying the experience far more than anticipated. American comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, David Hyde Pierce and Peri Gilpin.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Paul Quentel, president of Alfred Angelo, the second largest bridal retailer in the United States, goes undercover to solve any problems as quickly as possible. Posing as a contestant on a reality TV competition, he works among his own staff.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.sub-title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun: Davenport, Florida.
programme.desc: Angela and Michael Sidebotham from Lincolnshire are ready to fulfil their life-long dreams of buying a home in Davenport, Florida, where they plan to spend half of each year. With a budget of £160,000, Sara Damergi shows the couple five properties that meet their requirements.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Cumbria is the location for three more couples to demonstrate their cooking and hosting skills, kicking off with teachers Rory and Sam, who serve up dishes inspired by Europe. Day two sees Sarka and Paul lay on a Czech menu, but the massive portions defeat everyone - except the ever-hungry Rory. Finally, it's the turn of John and Sally with their retro 1980s evening. Which couple will win the cash prize of £1,000?.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Dan takes his sister to test drive a monster truck, Wendy comes across a handbag that could be very valuable, and Larry and Neil examine some works of art bought in a pub.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with historian and broadcaster Suzannah Lipscomb in Dictionary Corner alongside Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps a couple with a £250,000 budget who have decided to move full time to northern Costa Blanca, but first they must choose from five possible homes.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander helps a retired couple searching for a house in south Wales, as well as two keen sailors who want a property in Hampshire with easy access to the sea and London.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at the Five Bells near Dover, where manager Shelley Parnell and her competitive mum Linda Yates hope their bargain-priced B&B will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The first of a week of dinner parties in Belfast is hosted by 30-year-old mobile phone sales manager Steve, who hopes to impress guests Justin, Julie, Cushla and Marty.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer accidentally declares himself bankrupt, while Bart and Lisa con a delivery man into giving them a large amount of cardboard boxes. Grampa leaves the Springfield Retirement Castle and ends up falling in love with Selma.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Granny Campbell wants Courtney to come back to Scotland and Grace freaks Warren out, while Darren plans a special foreign film night for Nancy, but when Kyle calls asking for them to visit, he begins to panic.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Dispatches
programme.sub-title: Secrets of Britain's New Homes: Channel 4 Dispatches.
programme.desc: As the national spotlight falls on the need for Britain to build more high-quality affordable homes, this investigation asks why so few affordable properties are being constructed at a time when housebuilders have been making record profits. Reporter Antony Barnett travels across the country revealing how companies have failed to deliver affordable new homes and asks questions about the links between the Government and the property industry.(n)

programme.title: How to Retire at 40
programme.desc: Anna Richardson meets people who have found ingenious or unusual ways to retire early, including friends who discovered how to buy property for less, a man who has made his fortune sending potatoes through the post; and a family who insist on only spending money two days a week. Journalist Sophie Morgan talks to trendspotters who are trailblazing new methods of saving money including how to get restaurant quality meals for a fraction of the price. Plus, consumer journalist Rhik Samadder meets some more of Britain's leading supersavers.(n)

programme.title: Catching a Killer
programme.sub-title: Catching a Killer: The Wind in the Willows Murder.
programme.desc: In April last year, 42-year-old antiquarian book dealer Adrian Greenwood was found dead in his home, having been stabbed more than 30 times in a frenzied and brutal attack - with no suspects, no witnesses and no sign of forced entry. This documentary follows the work of the Thames Valley Police Major Crime Unit as Det Supt Kevin Brown and his team embark on their investigation into who killed Greenwood, as well as find out what happened to the victim's early edition of The Wind in the Willows, worth £50,000.(n)

programme.title: 60 Days in Jail
programme.desc: The return of the programme in which Sheriff Jamey Noel tries to root out crime and corruption in an Indiana prison, sending eight more volunteers into Clark County Jail as undercover inmates to help him understand more about how drugs and contraband are getting into the facility. The first edition follows former corrections officer Sheri, ex-army reserve medic Ryan, retired police officer Quintin. and Monalisa, whose own daughter is incarcerated.(n)

programme.title: Bodyshockers
programme.desc: Katie Piper meets people who love their body work and those who loathe it, including Jill, who painted the town red then rounded off the night with a DIY inking. programme.desc: Jenno and Bucko race to assist when Jim is rammed by a runaway driver, while Dan and Gordy have to resort to physical force on a drunk who is menacing a family. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Dan and Gordy engage in the high-speed pursuit of a dangerous disqualified driver, while the big blue van is called in when a late-night scuffle spirals out of control, Jim's intuition is proven right after a routine stop reveals a secret stash, and the hunt is on for a wanted man in a bobble hat.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Barry Peach outsmarts a disqualified driver, handler Jon Peacock takes his new sniffer dog Jack to carry out a drugs warrant, Carl Warrener makes a jaw-dropping discovery when he pulls a car over in the early hours and Brian Conville gets mobbed when he deals with a reckless learner driver.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: Documentary marking the centenary of the Windsor dynasty by examining the history of the royal residence over the past 80 years, looking at the tragedies and triumphs that have had an impact on the Queen and her family. The first edition reflects on the events of the past 25 years, including the fire in November 1992 that started in the private chapel and came at the end of a terrible year for the royals, with marital troubles hitting the Queen's three elder children.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: A look back at the series of events that shaped the monarchy between 1936 and 1952, using dramatic reconstructions and an extraordinary archive of film. Edward VIII's abdication in 1936 meant that his brother ?Bertie' became King George VI, and his eldest daughter Elizabeth was now suddenly and unexpectedly heir to the throne. When the Second World War broke out, Elizabeth and her sister Margaret moved into the safe haven that was Windsor Castle, which Elizabeth loved for its history and its heritage, while for Margaret it was one big adventure playground.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: A look back at events that shaped the monarchy between 1952 and 1972, using dramatic reconstructions and archive film. As the royal family made Windsor its home, Prince Philip grew restless. The Queen assigned him as ranger of Windsor Great Park, but that only led to more problems. Meanwhile, Princess Margaret exhibited a wild streak to her character as a party animal, the Queen Mother reportedly ran up debts of £7million, and the papers began to print stories suggesting extramarital affairs had taken place.(n)

programme.title: Inside Windsor Castle
programme.desc: The series concludes with a look at 20 years in the life of the Queen and her family. It covers the era from 1972, when she celebrated her 25th wedding anniversary to 1992, when several divorces and a fire at Windsor Castle rocked one of the world's best-loved families. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: First Test Day Four.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the fourth day's play in the First Test of the four-match series, which took place at Lord's. With commentary by Graeme Smith, Geoffrey Boycott, Simon Hughes, Michael Vaughan and Mark Nicholas.(n)

programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: That's So
programme.desc: Memories of the year Italy hosted the World Cup, in which England lost to Germany in the semi-finals on penalties. Back home, Mrs Thatcher resigned as prime minister, reluctantly handing over the reins to John Major and Eurotunnel builders from the UK and France met 40 metres beneath the Channel, establishing the first land connection between Britain and mainland Europe for 8,000 years. Fears of the spread of BSE - so-called mad cow disease - grew, while culturally, every child wanted to be a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle and, thanks to Madonna, everyone was Vogueing.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: OMG
programme.sub-title: OMG! Make Me a Famous Face.
programme.desc: People undergoing cosmetic surgery to look like celebrities, including a Katie Price fan undergoing dangerous low budget tanning procedures, and a model trying to transform herself into Kim Kardashian and her friend into Zayn Malik. Plus, a man who wants to look like a Ken doll - to his boyfriend's horror.(n)

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bail enforcement agent is assigned the task of tracking down his own ex-wife, a wily reporter chasing a story about a murder cover-up. However, bringing his former spouse to justice is harder than he anticipated, not least because she has also been targeted by the criminal she is investigating. Action comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Jennifer Aniston, Gio Perez, Joel Garland, Jason Kolotouros and Matt Malloy.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits the Little Thatch Inn in Gloucester and meets the property's owners, mother-and-daughter team Jackie and Beth McDougall, who have conflicting ideas over whether to modernise in the hope of attracting more custom. In the past, the 23-bedroom hotel and its restaurant ran a brisk trade, but today business has slowed considerably and the duo have considered cutting their losses and selling up. Alex gets to work ensuring the duo can start working in tandem and look forward to a brighter future.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: Engineer Rob Bell explores the history of the design and construction of the Tyne Bridge and discovers that many believe that it was the inspiration for the Sydney Harbour Bridge. He also discovers why the bridge is so revered by Geordies, not just as a way to cross the river, but because it was built to keep shipbuilders employed and their skills alive during the dark days of the 1920s recession.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Tim Marlow examines the work of Italian Renaissance painter Raffaello Santi, known better simply as Raphael, who was born in 1483 and achieved so much in his 37-year life that he was considered equal to Leonardo da Vinci and Michelangelo. He was highly regarded for his many studies of the Madonna and Child, and artists adopted his idealised forms as the model of beauty until the end of the 19th century.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.desc: In Scarborough, the police stop and search a car they suspect may be carrying drugs, but the stakes are raised very quickly when weapons are found, while in a village near Selby, the North Yorkshire road crime team arrests a teenager him for dealing marijuana. In Bradford, traffic cops help the drug squad chase down a class-A drugs dealer, while another team tracks a suspicious character into the toilets of a fast food outlet.(n)

programme.title: Eamonn & Ruth: How the Other Half Lives
programme.desc: Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford delve into the world of the landed gentry, trying their hands at clay-pigeon shooting with hand-engraved shotguns worth £100,000 each. The Queen's former butler instructs them in the subtle art of etiquette, while Her Majesty's official sculptor immortalises Eamonn's head in a traditional clay bust, before the couple find themselves partying with the daughters of high society at the elegant and exclusive Debutante's Ball.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: Landmark drama based on the Washington Post's investigation of the Watergate break-in which led to the most significant political scandal of the 1970s. With its painstaking reconstruction of the decade's political scene and tightly-scripted view of the world of the newsroom, this film excitingly combines all the elements of investigative journalism with those of a tense thriller(n)

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: An American businessman in Japan becomes the quarry of a cult of ninja assassins after he witnesses a woman's murder(n)

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: When a computer whizz-kid taps into the government early-warning system, it invites him to play Global Thermonuclear Warfare. Little does he realise that this is not a variation on Space Invaders, and his gleeful decision to nuke Las Vegas precipitates a full-scale countdown to Armageddon..(n)

programme.title: O
programme.desc: The classic story of ambition and envy is transferred to an exclusive American high school, where a basketball star goes out with the headmaster's daughter, unaware of the extent of his best friend's jealousy(n)

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
programme.desc: A 35-year-old father (Zach Braff) who's never quite grown up learns about life when he's forced to homeschool his kids, since their grandpa can no longer afford their private-school tuition and their public school is a mess(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Biopic of Ernie Davis, who overcame prejudice to become the first black athlete to win the highest honour in college football(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: John Moore's remake of the 1965 classic stars Dennis Quaid as a pilot who crash lands his passenger plane in the Gobi desert with no hope of rescue - unless they can scavenge enough parts to build a new plane(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A young woman (Teresa Palmer) must protect her brother (Gabriel Bateman) from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother (Maria Bello), who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana. Billy Burke and Alexander DiPersia co-star. Produced by James Wan (The Conjuring), Lights Out is a feature-length expansion of director David F. Sandberg's short film of the same name, which became a viral sensation online(n)

programme.title: The Forest
programme.desc: Set in the Aokigahara Forest, which is a place where people commit suicides, a young American woman, Sara, is in search of her twin sister, who has mysteriously disappeared in the forest. Despite the warnings from the villagers, Sara travels into the ghost-filled forest to save her sister to discover the truth while being confronted by angry and tormented souls of the dead that prey on anyone who crosses their paths(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A young thief named Bek enlists the help of the powerful Egyptian god Horus to overthrow the vicious deity Set, who has seized control of the land. Bek's true love has been captured, forcing the mortal rebel to fight back in order to free her and the people of Egypt from Set's tyrannical rule(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane fights terrorists in an Los Angeles skyscraper in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages(n)

programme.title: Pride and Glory
programme.desc: An NYPD detective's probe into the murder of four cops points to corruption and his own brother and brother-in-law---both of whom are cops. Edward Norton, Colin Farrell and Jon Voight star in this gritty and well-acted tale of duty, honor and loyalty. Noah Emmerich, Jennifer Ehle. Directed by Gavin O'Connor(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: In this intense romantic drama set in 1970s France, a former dancer and her writer husband attempt to revive their marriage by taking a cross-country journey to a small coastal town, where they bond with its quirky inhabitants(n)

programme.title: High Anxiety
programme.desc: The new head of a mental institution is accused of murder(n)

When he discovers that a man named Strom is the brains behind a major car theft and chop shop ring, he sees this as his opportunity to do something big. After his partner is killed, the case is then transferred to homicide, so he is taken off the case. And he is assigned a new partner, a cop who would prefer to play by the rules(n)

programme.desc: Deckhand Jake suffers an injury as the Northwestern's crew struggles to keep up with the maniacal pace of Captain Sig.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A 16-year-old claims she has been gang raped by her boyfriend and three of his friends, and Jo goes out on a limb to fight her case, even when it becomes clear the victim is not the innocent she at first appeared. When the girl later asks to drop the charges after receiving threatening telephone calls, Jo begs Terry for more time to extract a confession, determined not to let the arrogant youths get away with their crime.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: An intruder detained in a couple's flat turns out to have been there before, though the residents claim to have no idea who he is. Jo discovers the suspect works as a security guard in the same building as the woman, and investigates the theory he has been stalking her, but extracting a confession puts her in a tricky position. At the end of an arduous shift, she discovers her hard work is to be rewarded with promotion to sergeant. Guest starring Kara Tointon, Barry Sloane and Gareth David-Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: On her first shift as a sergeant, Jo is called to the scene of an aggravated robbery in which the homeowner died in a particularly violent and bloody way. When it emerges the victim was an abusive drunk and had been involved with another woman, Grace warms to the man's Asian-born widow and clashes with Max over his apparent racial prejudice. Gabrielle Glaister guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A letter bomb addressed to the manager of a successful company proves to be harmless but, after talking to the witnesses, Grace has a hunch that worse is to follow. The intended `victim' turns out to be cheating on his pregnant wife with his secretary, and a courier bears a grudge after being thrown out of the office, but the main suspect is the manager's own brother, who had recently been sacked.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: A baby girl, recently delivered by Jenny, is snatched from her pram, uniting the community in a desperate search for the missing child. A newlywed couple are excited about becoming parents - but when the wife develops a serious medical condition, their chances of happiness are jeopardised. Jessica Raine, Bryony Hannah and Miranda Hart star in the 1950s-set nursing drama, with Thomasin Rand and Tom Goodman-Hill.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny befriends Nonnatus House cleaner Peggy and her brother Frank, who has cancer, and learns all about the siblings' upbringing in the workhouse and the effect it has had on their relationship. Meanwhile, Fred has a new money-making venture - a pig called Evie - but his hopes of bringing home the bacon are scuppered when it turns out the porker is pregnant, so the midwives rally round to deliver the piglets.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Sister Monica Joan develops pneumonia after being found mysteriously wandering near the docks - but things only gets worse when she is accused of theft and faces the prospect of prison. Chummy's mother arrives to meet PC Noakes, but when the visit is less than a success, the midwife suffers a crisis of confidence and breaks off her relationship - leaving Jenny and the others trying to persuade her she is making a terrible mistake. Judy Parfitt, Miranda Hart and Jessica Raine star.(n)

programme.title: Catherine Cookson's The Gambling Man
programme.desc: Robson Green stars in the title role as Rory Connor, a rent collector who spends his nights at the gaming tables, secure in the knowledge that nobody can turn a card quite like him. Unfortunately, as the stakes get higher, Connor finds himself gambling more than money - with dramatic consequences for himself and those around him. Feature-length drama, with Bernard Hill and Sylvestra Le Touzel.(n)

programme.title: The Musketeers
programme.desc: Porthos wakes up in the street after a drunken night to find a dead body beside him, and is promptly sentenced to death. But then he is abducted by a mysterious gang of criminals who carry him off to the slums of Paris - the streets of his childhood - meaning the other Musketeers must infiltrate this dangerous district if they are to find their friend and prove his innocence. Howard Charles, Luke Pasqualino, Tom Burke and Santiago Cabrera star, with Ashley Walters and Anton Lesser.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: A veteran comedian is found dead in a sealed fallout shelter. Locked from the inside of the concrete bunker with no other means of exit, all clues point to suicide, but Maddy Magellan thinks otherwise and calls on the services of professional illusionist Jonathan Creek. Offbeat detective drama, starring Caroline Quentin and Alan Davies.(n)

programme.title: The Doctor Blake Mysteries
programme.desc: A Ballarat College schoolboy-rower wins a race on Lake Wendouree - only to drown after being ceremonially tossed in the lake. His mother asks Doctor Blake to find the truth behind her son's death, but Blake discovers that the truth is a murkier affair than expected, and that the boy was not the small-town sporting hero everyone - including his mother - thought he was.(n)

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Double bill. Nikki and Jack are called to a petrol station where three people have been shot dead, and conclude it is the work of a concealed shooter working from long range - a sniper is at large in London. They combine ballistics and wound pathology with the killer-profiling skills of senior investigator DCI Jane De Freitas, as they work to find this seemingly random murderer before panic hits the city. Starring Emilia Fox, David Caves and Richard Lintern, with Zoe Telford and Steve Wall.(n)

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: The French Intelligence Service asks for MI5's help in catching an arms expert suspected of trying to sell Eurofighter technology to the highest bidder. It seems a 14-year-old thief holds the key to acquiring the information, but the operation slides into disarray when the government orders the British team to acquire it for themselves, turning an exercise in international co-operation into a web of lies and mistrust. Matthew Macfadyen, Keeley Hawes and David Oyelowo star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny befriends Nonnatus House cleaner Peggy and her brother Frank, who has cancer, and learns all about the siblings' upbringing in the workhouse and the effect it has had on their relationship. Meanwhile, Fred has a new money-making venture - a pig called Evie - but his hopes of bringing home the bacon are scuppered when it turns out the porker is pregnant, so the midwives rally round to deliver the piglets.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: Trapped on the plateau, Edward, Agnes and Lord Roxton set out in search of professors Challenger and Summerlee, following their capture by the strange apemen who may provide the missing link between modern man and prehistoric life. But when they mount a rescue, the explorers are confronted by a tribe of Indians. Conclusion of the adventure, starring Bob Hoskins, Peter Falk and James Fox.(n)

programme.title: Garden Hopping
programme.desc: Daphne Ledward visits one of the National Gardens Scheme participants, Clearbeck House in Lancashire, where beautiful sculptures blend with the flowers and wildlife.(n)

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: A smallholder hopes a windfall will mean he can realise his dream of expanding into pig-keeping - until James diagnoses a case of swine fever. Christopher Timothy and Peter Davison star.(n)

programme.desc: A desperate woman barricades herself with her younger son into her estranged husband's house and alerts the police to the fact her children are being neglected and abused by their father. Jo establishes a computer link with her and builds up a measure of trust, but is concerned for the welfare of the boy when a shot is fired inside the house.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: An off-duty Callum is badly beaten after intervening in an argument between a couple, but turns up for work as usual the next day after a night in hospital. New PC Kirsty Knight (Sarah Manners) teams up with Jo and their inquiries lead to the arrest of the man responsible for the attack on their colleague, but he is released due to lack of evidence and Callum decides to take matters into his own hands.(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Richard has an accident and Hyacinth decides to buy a small country retreat - but her plans go awry in a most unexpected fashion. Comedy, starring Patricia Routledge and Clive Swift.(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Steve McAndrew brings his dying father to London so he can spend his final days in a nearby hospice, but how much time he can spend with his parent is anyone's guess - the Ucos team is hard at work investigating the cold case murder of 55-year-old interpreter Agnes Bradley. A DNA sample provides a link to a rebellious teenager, and the team wonders if the killer could be related to him. But a whole new can of worms is opened when investigators discover the lad's mother was raped - could the same person have killed Agnes? Gerry and Steve hope that interviewing her friends from a local chess club may shed new light on the matter, but it's a possible professional issue that could hold the key to unlocking the mystery. Denis Lawson and Dennis Waterman star.(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Dwayne is in high spirits after meeting a new woman on a night out, but his joy is cut short when she is found dead the following morning. It soon transpires the victim was living under a false identity and gathering evidence against a money-laundering ring, but as the team struggles to piece together the clues, Richard hears the news he has been longing for - his old job is available if he wants it. It looks like the Caribbean cops will be solving this murder without their British DI. John Thomson guest stars, with Ben Miller, Sara Martins, Danny John-Jules and Gary Carr.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: Highly regarded police officer DI Adrian Fell is invited to appear on Carla's Eyes and Ears true crime show, but the inquisitive amateur detective wonders what she has got herself into when evidence emerges that appears to implicate him in a murder. As Jonathan tries to separate truth from lies, he begins to suspect a mysterious chequered box belonging to the officer could hold the key to the conundrum. Offbeat detective drama, starring Alan Davies, Julia Sawalha and Colin McFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: The disappearance of a priceless porcelain figurine from a municipal museum triggers a series of tragic events, raising the ominous possibility that it could be cursed. As Jonathan and Carla search for the missing statuette, they are led on a quest deep into a sinister forest where an ancient beech tree could hold the key to the mystery. Offbeat detective drama, starring Alan Davies.(n)

programme.desc: Penny starts her own hair accessories business and the orders start to pile in. However, she makes the mistake of asking Sheldon to help, leading to frustration and regret. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny feels threatened when a sexy actress, who has landed a role in TV series CSI, moves into the apartment building, and gradually begins to sense that her friends are being manipulated by the new arrival. Comedy, starring Kaley Cuoco, Valerie Azlynn, Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny catches the eye of comic-book shopkeeper Stuart, and Leonard is devastated when she gives serious consideration to dating her new admirer. Desperate for help, Leonard enlists Sheldon to discredit his love rival by preying on his obsession with Batman. Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Kevin Sussman star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Stuart takes Penny out for a second date, during which she drunkenly reveals her true feelings. Meanwhile, Howard uncovers a flaw in the toilet he designed for a Nasa space shuttle, and asks his friends to help him correct it before the launch. Kaley Cuoco, Kevin Sussman and Simon Helberg star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon wins a grant to pay for a summer expedition to the North Pole, and invites his friends to join him. However, the gang's imminent departure causes Leonard and Penny to reconsider their feelings for each other. Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon returns to Texas in disgrace when he discovers his friends tampered with the Arctic expedition data after growing tired of his quest for a scientific breakthrough. Elsewhere, Leonard becomes frustrated as constant interruptions hamper his attempts to woo Penny.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Howard stake their most coveted comic books on a bet over the species of a cricket, while Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first night together. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon succeeds in getting Penny to conform to his high standards, so Leonard adopts a similar strategy for his romantic gain. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj meet two women at a goth nightclub and things appear to go well - until they are taken to a tattoo parlour.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon cannot contain his jealousy when he hears that his university colleague Bert has won a prestigious fellowship with an impressive grant. Elsewhere, Howard finds an old remote-controlled toy he made in the past, but the rest of the group do not seemed to be too impressed by it. Stephen Hawking guest stars.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade guides Joel Dommett, Jermaine Jenas, Adil Ray, Tamara Wall and team captain Rylan Clark-Neal on an epic adventure through four fantastical zones - Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Futuristic. In each zone the team members must conquer physical, skill, mystery and mental challenges in a bid to win crystals. These elusive crystals each give them five seconds inside the iconic Crystal Dome, where they hope to collect gold tokens to convert into prizes.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jay's stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Comedy sequel, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will discovers that attending a mixed-sex school is not so bad after all when he manages to get a date with the most popular girl in the year above. However, his growing obsession with her begins to alienate him from his friends. Comedy, starring Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, James Buckley and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The lads visit a Caravan Club meeting under the impression that it is really a massive orgy, but are embarrassed when Jay's dad decides to give them advice on sex - whether they like it or not. Sitcom about four teenagers growing up in suburbia, starring Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, James Buckley and Blake Harrison.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane features more internet clips, including one of the worst wedding ring deliveries ever, a hopeless football miss, and a funny cross trainer fail.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: The team meets Will, who needs Lou's help covering a famous face in an intimate place, and Jay assists glamour model Gigi, who has the initials of two exes on her chest. Fellow customer Chris has a tattoo dedicated to his best friend's mum, and Anya also needs assistance as she drunkenly got a matching tattoo with a guy she met on holiday, but has no idea who he is. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Irreverent panel show hosted by Jimmy Carr, in which guests join team captains Rob Beckett and Aisling Bea to answer questions based on opinion polls. Aisling is joined by Rizzle Kicks' Jordan Stephens and comedian Desiree Burch, while Rob teams up with Loose Women panellist Ayda Field and comic Dane Baptiste.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The nation's favourite armchair critics share their opinions on Doctor Thorne, Employable Me, Dogs Might Fly, Tribes, Predators & Me, Line of Duty, Heston's Dinner in Space and the news. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively - sometimes emotional - discussions from the comfort of their own homes.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Milo helps Cindy to fake a robbery at The Emporium for the sympathy vote in the election, while Jesse takes Grace for a viewing at a potential new club. Elsewhere, Goldie panics when she finds out that Hunter and Simone have gone to the police station to tell the truth about Prince.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Maxine is sure that Darcy is lying about being homeless and decides to prove it, and Courtney is suspicious about why her Grandmother is being so nice. Meanwhile, Cindy has the opportunity to ruin Simone's political chances.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The tourists arrive in Granada, Spain, where they are left stunned by the skills of the dancers at a flamenco class. An alarm is raised after a frightening turn of events at the Alhambra Palace, and an already busy day draws to a close for guide Brendan Sheerin with a particularly hectic vote.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: A heartbroken Tiff is in need of distraction and decides to throw all her efforts into working under fashionista Rosie, while Toff sets her sights on inventor Richard Dinan.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta and Boyle go on an eight-day stakeout, which puts a strain on their friendship. Meanwhile, Jeffords uses Santiago and Gina for inspiration when he writes a book about his daughters, and Captain Holt's nephew visits Brooklyn and makes an instant impression on Diaz. Comedy, guest starring Kyra Sedgwick and Nick Cannon.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The team visits Boyle's beach house on a detectives-only getaway, but Peralta ruins the fun by inviting Captain Holt along. The host helps Diaz to send romantic texts to her new boyfriend Marcus, while Gina amuses herself by trying to get Santiago drunk. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel tries to gain votes by co-hosting a local TV show with Joe, and their on-camera bickering makes them an instant hit. But their popularity begins to have an effect on Lennox and Ryder, so they must decide on whether fame or family is more important. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel's new boyfriend Noah temporarily moves in to her apartment while his is being renovated, and Lennox starts a dream internship at a local newspaper - but struggles to wake up in time for work.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Riley doubts her future with Ben after a psychic reading suggests their relationship is doomed. Ben tries to convince her that they are soulmates, but realises he knows very little about what makes her happy. Tucker does his best to persuade Bonnie to move out of the flat, while Danny asks Bonnie's ex-boyfriend Brad to help him cover up the failure of his Paris adventure.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Danny saves the day when Ben and Riley are mugged - but cannot take any of the credit because he is still pretending that he lives in Paris. Tucker realises that such a great human interest story gives him the perfect opportunity to save his job on Mary Hart's TV show, so he invites Ben and Riley to appear on the programme to talk about their experience. Mary Hart guest stars.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin is upset to discover her mother cannot attend the wedding. Meanwhile, the gang thinks back six months to when Barney accepted a series of romantic challenges from Lily and Robin, and ponders the nature of the ever-changing love triangle between Ted, Robin and Barney. Guest starring Bryan Cranston.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney becomes convinced he can reunite his parents after seeing them together for the first time in years - but does not realise his brother James has something else in mind. Meanwhile, Ted investigates when a gift Barney planned to give to Robin is ruined. Guest starring John Lithgow and Wayne Brady.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess invites Paul, a fellow teacher she has a crush on, to the gang's Thanksgiving dinner party, but the proceedings do not go according to plan. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel, with Justin Long (He's Just Not That into You).(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess is desperate to find space where her handbell quartet can practise, so she brings the members to the flat - where things take an unexpected turn when Winston reveals his hidden musical talents. Meanwhile, Nick and Schmidt become embroiled in an increasingly heated argument over DIY. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel, Lamorne Morris and Jake Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake is excited to work a case with the best detective in the NYPD, Dave Majors - until his colleague shares his intentions to ask Amy out on a date. Rosa's surprising fashion choice causes a stir, and Charles and Gina make an unexpected discovery. Comedy, with Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt begins to worry he is being set up for a fall by one of his superiors, and Peralta is handed the chance to work on an important case. Meanwhile, Jeffords tries to make sure his twins get a place at their chosen school. Comedy, with Andy Samberg and Terry Crews.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon introduces Amy to Raiders of the Lost Ark - one of his favourite films - and is distraught when she ends up pointing out a plot hole that ruins the whole story. Meanwhile, Leonard realises he can manipulate Penny into feeling sorry for him when his mother publishes a reveal-all book about his childhood problems. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon re-evaluates the time he spends with Amy when she takes a job at the university. Meanwhile, Howard is forced to sleep on his friend's sofa after he gets into an argument with Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Mayim Bialik.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted attempts to help a stressed Barney decide which suit to wear on the morning of his wedding. Lily believes that Robin is not treating the most important day of her life with the significance it deserves and the pair argue. Later, the gang watches an embarrassing film. American sitcom, guest starring Tracey Ullman and Jon Heder.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall asks Ted and Barney to help him figure out where Lily went on the night of their argument, and is shocked when he discovers the truth. Meanwhile, Robin is concerned when Barney starts to act like her father did on his wedding day. American sitcom, guest starring Kyle MacLachlan and Tracey Ullman.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess agrees to look after Russell's daughter while he is out of town, and does her best to demonstrate good mothering skills. However, his ex-wife Ouli (guest star Jeanne Tripplehorn) is unhappy with the arrangement. Winston's boss torments him on the way to an important talk-show appearance, Cece is terrified that she might be pregnant, and Nick has to defend his new relationship.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess witnesses an argument between Russell and his ex-wife Ouli (Dermot Mulroney and Jeanne Tripplehorn) and worries that her own relationship with him does not have the same sexual tension. Cece encourages Schmidt to date Nadia, and Nick devotes time to cultivating his vegetables in the rooftop garden.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max is heartbroken when Randy breaks up with her via his therapist, so Caroline rents a party bus in the hope of cheering her friend up. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.sub-title: And the Show and Don't Tell.
programme.desc: The friends go to prison to see Caroline's father, Martin, perform in a musical, and tell him they plan to use the movie money to create a dessert bar.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When the guys are unable to get tickets for the Comic-Con, Leonard, Howard and Raj decide to buy fake passes from a stranger - but they then worry about getting caught with them. Sheldon decides to hold his own comic-book convention and searches for a suitable star guest for the event. Meanwhile, the girls take tea at a hotel but discover that maturity is over-rated. Comedy, guest starring James Earl Jones and Carrie Fisher.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy take a train ride to the Napa Valley with Howard and Bernadette on Valentine's Day, while Leonard and Penny head to the vets when they volunteer to look after Raj's dog. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darren and Nancy go to visit Kyle, but Nancy is worried about his welfare, while Tom and Alfie get the wrong end of the stick at The Loft and Courtney makes a big decision.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: Vlogglebox
programme.desc: Young people review the most popular viral content, including Russell Kane on Theresa May, the magic money tree and the DUP, and bathing in Nutella.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj accepts Sheldon's offer to work for him as he is desperate to avoid being sent back to India. Howard starts spending more time with Leonard and Penny, who would rather be left alone. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is given the chance to square off against the one actor from the Star Trek franchise he holds a grudge against - Wil Wheaton. Meanwhile, Leonard asks Penny to set Howard up on a date with one of her friends. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.desc: Documentary looking at the hunting behaviour of sharks, including footage of nighttime hunting, as well as the link they share with coral reefs.(n)

programme.title: Shark
programme.desc: A look at how scientists are challenging traditional perceptions of sharks, with breakthroughs regarding the creatures' intelligence and social skills presenting them in a surprising new light. The programme also highlights some researchers' beliefs that studying the predators could help to solve some of the most pressing medical challenges of the 21st century. Narrated by Paul McGann. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: The Girl Who Talked to Dolphins
programme.desc: Documentary exploring an attempt to teach a dolphin to understand English. In the 1960s, a scientist flooded a house and invited a young woman to live there full time with the animal in the hope that the creature would be able to communicate with her. Featuring contributions from those involved in the experiment, who are speaking about events for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The team splits up to search for evidence of tigers, with Justine Evans and the scientists heading to the jungle of northern Burma. Gordon Buchanan travels to the forests of the far south, which were once home to a thriving population of the big cat, but as the area has been isolated by war for more than 60 years, little is known about the fate of the animals. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: Documentary examining what happens during an infestation, beginning with the causes of agricultural plagues and pests and the effects they have on the global food supply.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor braves the wild waters of British Columbia, Canada, to find caviar-rich sturgeon and prize salmon. He then takes part in an angling contest and spends 24 hours on a commercial trawler in the ocean off Vancouver Island.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: The migration of elephant herds across Botswana's Kalahari Desert during the annual flooding of the Okavango Delta, which turns 4,000 square miles of arid plains into a maze of wetlands, setting the scene for great clashes between animals in search of water. Resourceful elephants make the most of stagnant pools and waterholes guarded by lions, while hippos converge on prime territories to do battle. David Attenborough narrates.(n)

programme.title: Wild China
programme.desc: The series concludes with a visit to the country's eastern seaboard to investigate how the Chinese government is managing environmental concerns while meeting the ever-expanding needs of the population. Among the region's diverse locales lie futuristic cities, seaweed-thatched villages and rugged wetlands that are home to some of the world's rarest animal species. Last in the series.(n)

programme.desc: A mild-mannered single dad working as a security guard at a New Jersey mall has to save the day when a gang of thieves try to pull a big heist. Kevin James cowrote and stars in this hilarious farce(n)

programme.desc: Newcomers Will Ferrell and Chris Kattan are the stars of this streetwise comedy about two brothers who try to get into the exclusive Roxbury nightclub(n)

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragon-slayer hook up to thwart an evil king in this engaging fantasy adventure(n)

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Political comedy in which a prospective state governor's election prospects are jeopardised by his wayward younger brother. Expecting his mischievous sibling to be something of a liability during his campaign, the aspiring politician orders one of his aides to keep him out of the public eye - a task he does not relish(n)

programme.title: Comes a Horseman
programme.desc: James Caan, Jane Fonda and Jason Robards in this account of a rancher-cattle baron conflict in the West. Filmed in Colorado's Wet Mountain Valley. George Grizzard. Dodger: Richard Farnsworth. Blocker: Jim Davis. Billy Joe: Mark Harmon. Alan J. Pakula directed(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Newcomers Will Ferrell and Chris Kattan are the stars of this streetwise comedy about two brothers who try to get into the exclusive Roxbury nightclub(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Ice Cube co-wrote and stars in this second sequel to the 1995 comedy "Friday," which once again follows a day in the life of two cousins in Los Angeles. This time, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) are robbed by Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and the not-so-jolly old elf has made off with their rent money. John Witherspoon, Bebe Drake(n)

programme.desc: Charlie Sheen and Emilio Estevez star as two bin men caught up in a farcical murder mystery(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots!
programme.desc: Parody of "Top Gun" in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: Commando Charlie Sheen infiltrates the Middle East with the help of Lloyd Bridges' barking mad president and old flame Valeria Golino. Rambo meets Airplane! in this spoof(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Baseball comedy following a team of bungling amateurs and over-the-hill athletes through an unexpected winning streak. When a former chorus girl inherits the ownership of the Cleveland Indians from her deceased husband, she deliberately puts together a bad team in an attempt to relocate them to Miami. But, against all odds, the team begins winning matches. A sequel followed in 1994(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: This exercise in patriotic, high-tech action centers on a select group of Navy commandos and their battles against a Middle East terrorist group. This particular squadron is led by a pair of rivals: cocky, fiery Hawkins (Charlie Sheen) and stoic, unflappable Curran (Michael Biehn). When an anti-terrorist mission goes awry, allowing an enemy leader to escape with a supply of stolen American missiles, both men are certain that, given another chance, they can redeem themselves and the squad. Their rivalry plays out against a background of high-powered amphibious battles, allowing the film to revel in dangerous stunts and advanced weaponry. Joanne Whalley-Kilmer provides brief romantic relief as a journalist with important information, but the focus remains on the macho interplay between Hawkins and Curran. Co-written by former Navy Seal Chuck Pfarrer (with Gary Goldman), the film presents authentic details about the elite unit, but the bulk of Navy Seals tends to rely on familiar combat film conventions. Viewers seeking rapidly paced action sequences will not be disappointed, though other viewers may be less likely to overlook the predictable storyline and routine characters(n)

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Newcomers Will Ferrell and Chris Kattan are the stars of this streetwise comedy about two brothers who try to get into the exclusive Roxbury nightclub(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

Thriller, based on a true story. A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor (Kevin Spacey) to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security (Laurence Fishburne) makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed 'Generation X' comedy about a day in the life of a pair of shop workers. Shot in black-and-white, the movie stars Brian O'Halloran as Dante, the young assistant in a convenience store, and Jeff Anderson as Randal, an employee in the video rental shop next door(n)

programme.desc: Unless he comes up with $50,000, Peter and his Average Joe's Gym will be swallowed up by White Goodman's bodybuilding empire. His only chance is to take a team of no-hopers to the national dodgeball finals, and a bruising showdown with White. Anarchic comedy(n)

programme.desc: Charlie Sheen and Emilio Estevez star as two bin men caught up in a farcical murder mystery(n)

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: Kevin Kline stars in this smart, funny comedy about a small town schoolteacher who is 'outed' on national television by an ex-student collecting an Oscar. Howard Brackett lives a normal, contented life with an apartment and a fiancée until the fateful day when he is declared to be gay. He denies the claim to his family, to his friends and to the pack of journalists who descend on the town but no one seems to believe him. Surely it is possible for a straight man to love Barbra Streisand. Isn't it?(n)

But, against all odds, the team begins winning matches. A sequel followed in 1994(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Engaging coming-of-age study about the romantic entanglements of three young women at a pizzeria(n)

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: Comic drama focusing on a shy, artistic teenager from the wrong side of the tracks who is infatuated with a gorgeous classmate and doesn't realise his tomboy best friend is in love with him. Virtually a remake - albeit with the characters' sexes reversed - by writer/producer John Hughes and director Howard Deutch of their 1986 hit teen angst comedy-drama 'Pretty in Pink'(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: 1980s teen comedies finally get the parody they so richly deserve with Wet Hot American Summer, the first feature film from writer/director David Wain and co-screenwriter Michael Showalter, formerly of the sketch comedy troupe the State. It's the last day of the summer season at Camp Firewood, and as camp director Beth (Janeane Garofalo) prepares to wrap things up, the staff of teenage counselors realize this is their last chance to do something about the summer romances that have been brewing for the past three months. Sweet but shy Coop (Michael Showalter) is crazy about pretty Katie (Marguerite Moreau), but there's the problem of her severely moody boyfriend Andy (Paul Rudd). Meanwhile, Victor (Ken Marino) is trying to score with sexy Abby (Marisa Ryan), who is known to make friends easily, and McKinley (Michael Ian Black) and Ben (Bradley Cooper) attempt to keep their hot and heavy relationship a secret. Meanwhile, arts and crafts teacher Gail (Molly Shannon) turns to her students for comfort as her marriage falls apart, drama coach Susie (Amy Poehler) tries to whip the talent show into shape with Ben's help, and camp chef Gene (Christopher Meloni) deals with his unique sexual quirks with the help of a talking can of vegetables (voiced by H. Jon Benjamin). Beth even finds time for romance with socially inept astrophysicist Henry (David Hyde Pierce), but first Henry has to save Camp Firewood from a large piece of space junk about to re-enter Earth's atmosphere. Like Wain and Showalter, Ken Marino, Michael Ian Black, and Joe Lo Truglio (who appears in a small role) were also members of the State; fellow State alumnus Kerri Kenney was cast in a supporting role in the film, but her character didn't appear in the final cut(n)

programme.desc: Third entry in the adventure saga sends a resurrected buccaneer, a feisty heroine and her swashbuckling lover on a voyage to rescue Captain Jack Sparrow from Davy Jones's locker(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Till Death Do Us Part. The Team crashes a wedding forced by the groom to gain control of the company he shared with the bride's late father(n)

programme.title: 14 Blades
programme.desc: Noble Jinyiwei Qinglong must fight his former allies after an evil eunuch overthrows the Emperor. Now, in order to restore the rightful Emperor to his throne, Qinglong must use his blades to defeat the very assassins he once fought alongside(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Third entry in the adventure saga sends a resurrected buccaneer, a feisty heroine and her swashbuckling lover on a voyage to rescue Captain Jack Sparrow from Davy Jones's locker(n)

programme.title: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla
programme.desc: Director Masaaki Tezuka follows up his debut feature Godzilla vs. Megaguirus with another movie starring everyone's favorite giant lizard. One of at least three films in the history of the Godzilla franchise to find the merciless reptile pitted against his mechanical counterpart, Godzilla x Mechagodzilla finds humans under attack by the green beast. With little hope left, they build the giant man-piloted robot Mechagodzilla to defend the world. This film was also released under the titles Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla and Gojira x Mekagojira. Tezuka's next film, Godzilla x Mothra x Mechagodzilla: Tokyo S.O.S. upped ante even further, with the addition of Mothra into the mix(n)

programme.title: Never Back Down
programme.desc: New in town Jake Tyler finds himself lured into a fight with local martial arts champion Ryan McCarty. After suffering a humiliating beating, Jake seeks the mentoring of a veteran fighter(n)

programme.title: Way of The Dragon
programme.desc: The last film of Bruce Lee's career, released after his death. Here, Lee pays a visit to family members who own a restaurant in Italy. But mobsters, who want the land the eatery is built upon, harass the owners, forcing Lee to defend his family, as only he can. In the film's high-voltage, high-kickin' finale, Lee, for the sake of his loved ones, must battle a U.S. karate expert in a Roman coliseum! This film was completed before "Enter the Dragon", Lee's final film, but was released after it. It is the only film on which he served as director, writer and actor(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: This sequel to Speed sees Annie back and Jan de Bont directing but with Jason Patric as Alex Shaw taking over the Keanu Reeves role. The pair are an item and decide on a romantic cruise to the Caribbean. Unfortunately, also aboard the cruise liner are a gathering of diamond merchants, complete with their wares and arch-villain John Geiger, who plans to steal their merchandise. Unlike the original Speed , where the trick was that the bus would explode if it slowed down, this time, speed is of the essence - the plan is to ram the ship into dry land and, in the mayhem, escape with the loot. Bullock and Patric are perfect as the dynamic duo who save the day and the ocean-going scenario allows for more spectacular special effects than the original. Edited for language and violence(n)

This film was completed before "Enter the Dragon", Lee's final film, but was released after it. It is the only film on which he served as director, writer and actor(n)

programme.title: Rapid Fire
programme.desc: Militia men attempt a daylight bank robbery in a sleepy, rural city in California in this crime story based on real events(n)

programme.title: Lord of Illusions
programme.desc: Horror tale about a detective trying to get to the bottom of a mystery. New York private eye Harry D0092Amour takes on a routine case which turns ominous when he stumbles upon a mystery involving the world famous illusionist, Philip Swann and his beautiful wife, Dorothea. When a tragedy occurs at one of Swann0092s magic shows, Harry is drawn towards a whirlpool of deceit and unimaginable terrors. As he begins to fall in love with Dorothea, he comes face-to-face with Nix, the diabolic power which gave Swann his dark magic(n)

programme.title: Mobsters
programme.desc: High testosterone-count gangster thriller, set in the organized crime-ridden America of the 1920s. Four young men, Charlie 'Lucky' Luciano, Meyer Lansky, Benny 'Bugsy' Siegel and Frank Costello, form a bond of loyalty and friendship which sees them rise to the pinnacle of the criminal underworld. Gradually though, they find themselves caught between two much more powerful mob bosses: Don Masseria and Arnold Rothstein, who make their lives far more dangerous. A well-plotted, energetically stylish first feature from former advert director Michael Karbelnikoff(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: This sequel to Speed sees Annie back and Jan de Bont directing but with Jason Patric as Alex Shaw taking over the Keanu Reeves role. The pair are an item and decide on a romantic cruise to the Caribbean. Unfortunately, also aboard the cruise liner are a gathering of diamond merchants, complete with their wares and arch-villain John Geiger, who plans to steal their merchandise. Unlike the original Speed , where the trick was that the bus would explode if it slowed down, this time, speed is of the essence - the plan is to ram the ship into dry land and, in the mayhem, escape with the loot. Bullock and Patric are perfect as the dynamic duo who save the day and the ocean-going scenario allows for more spectacular special effects than the original. Edited for language and violence(n)

programme.title: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla
programme.desc: Director Masaaki Tezuka follows up his debut feature Godzilla vs. Megaguirus with another movie starring everyone's favorite giant lizard. One of at least three films in the history of the Godzilla franchise to find the merciless reptile pitted against his mechanical counterpart, Godzilla x Mechagodzilla finds humans under attack by the green beast. With little hope left, they build the giant man-piloted robot Mechagodzilla to defend the world. This film was also released under the titles Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla and Gojira x Mekagojira. Tezuka's next film, Godzilla x Mothra x Mechagodzilla: Tokyo S.O.S. upped ante even further, with the addition of Mothra into the mix(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat stars as an ageless Tibetan monk whose task is to guard the mystical Scroll of the Ultimate from modern-day Nazis. He rescued the scroll from their clutches in 1943, denying them victory in the war, but the fascists still want it so the Third Reich can rise again. In modern-day New York, the monk finds an apprentice in the unlikely guise of Kar, a punk pickpocket. He teaches him both the history of the scroll and the martial arts skills he will need to defend it, as the pair have to fend off the enemy, who are beginning to close in. Paul Hunter's all-action film also stars Jaime King as Scott's love interest and Victoria Smurfit as the fanatical granddaughter of Nazi Strucker(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: A deliriously daffy action flick, set in 1940s China, about a wannabe gangster who tries to extort a town in order to impress an outlaw gang(n)

programme.title: Way of The Dragon
programme.desc: The last film of Bruce Lee's career, released after his death. Here, Lee pays a visit to family members who own a restaurant in Italy. But mobsters, who want the land the eatery is built upon, harass the owners, forcing Lee to defend his family, as only he can. In the film's high-voltage, high-kickin' finale, Lee, for the sake of his loved ones, must battle a U.S. karate expert in a Roman coliseum! This film was completed before "Enter the Dragon", Lee's final film, but was released after it. It is the only film on which he served as director, writer and actor(n)

programme.title: Mobsters
programme.desc: High testosterone-count gangster thriller, set in the organized crime-ridden America of the 1920s. Four young men, Charlie 'Lucky' Luciano, Meyer Lansky, Benny 'Bugsy' Siegel and Frank Costello, form a bond of loyalty and friendship which sees them rise to the pinnacle of the criminal underworld. Gradually though, they find themselves caught between two much more powerful mob bosses: Don Masseria and Arnold Rothstein, who make their lives far more dangerous. A well-plotted, energetically stylish first feature from former advert director Michael Karbelnikoff(n)

programme.title: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In this crime thriller, L.L. Cool J is a underworld boss so powerful that his nickname is "God." He has his fingers in 80% of the drug traffic in Cincinnati, has won over nearly every adversary through bribery or intimidation, and seems practically untouchable. New police detective Jeffrey Cole (Omar Epps), convinced that he's the man who can bring down "God" and his empire, assumes a criminal identity that allows him to infiltrate "God"'s organization. However, the longer Cole remains inside the underworld, the more he finds himself caught up in it, and getting out of "God"'s empire becomes more difficult than getting in. The supporting cast includes Stanley Tucci as Cole's superior, Nia Long as Cole's girlfriend , and Pam Grier as an undercover detective, as well as hip-hop artists Nas and Mya(n)
